MAP.COMMENT: Registry is explicitly flagged as not trusty, so no checks are necessary

MAP.NAME: true
MAP.COMMENT: It's been acceptated by us, so all good!

SEQUENCE.NAME: $default
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: Not signed or accepted by us, lets check if it at least valid

EXIT.NAME: $default
EXIT.FAILURE-MESSAGE: signature is not valid for tag
EXIT.COMMENT: throw error, signature is not good
